website_summaries.verdict: The latest version of OfficeSuite Pro brings a completely refreshed interface to an already capable mobile office suite which is well worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to save anything. Pointless
customer_reviews.text: Files disappear. A basic word processing system should allow you to create and then save. And for you to find those files easily. Not so here. I don't want all that pointless fancy stuff. I want to create, save and be able to access my documents. Folks, don't bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Almost useless to me
customer_reviews.text: I would rather have something that works better and is more compatible with MS Office, even if I had to pay. I don't use this software at all. Even free, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use, it does all that I required as I'm retired. I still write letters, use spreadsheets and keep in touch with people, it's idea, not too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good and easy to use, great for work on the tablet
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: couldn't get this to work ..wish i didn't buy this ...its waste of money how do i get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth cost
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this on my kindle fire so I could use files from my laptop I already had rather than having to redo in another form. Still getting fully to grips with it but does the job and once fluent it may be five stars too early to say yet.
customer_reviews.author: Penjamino

customer_reviews.title: Great app for reading attachments.
customer_reviews.text: I use this app very regularly for reading attachments to emails. I find it a great app,very quick and easy to use. I got it free of charge when it was app of the day some months ago which is especially pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: petejl

customer_reviews.title: little gem
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to access documents from home as unable to access email or downloads at work. This gives me the ability to bring them with me. Haven't used all of it's nooks and crannies, but it appears to do the job perfectly well and fairly self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: cherry blossom

customer_reviews.title: It could have been a great piece of software if the user manual was printable
customer_reviews.text: It could have been a great piece of software if the user manual was printable, which it doesn't. My attempt at editing tables has failed. Besides, it keeps indicating that there were some errors.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V. Kovalenko

customer_reviews.title: Ok but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this part of Appstore free app of the day i am currently using this app on my BlackBerry passport. The functionality of the app is truly unique but not perfect at times it's unuseable, as free giveaway I guss can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Perry Terris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Some people dont know why you pay for it. It gives you everything for free and worth that amount of money. Even though I got it for free on the free apps I would still pay that amount. Works very well on documents and opening pdf files. Amazing app.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I very nice Office for Phone or Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this app on my phone and tablet, just to update my CV, but I have got to say that it comes with some very very useful templates for users to play with, much better then Google docs. I am loving this app!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laight

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!!
customer_reviews.text: This app is perfect for me since I can create, save and carry on with my Word documents and PowerPoint documents. I honestly don't understand why people are putting such negative reviews on this incredibly useful app. (I can even create seperate folders!!)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really suited my purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent for editing pdfs and that's mainly what I wanted. When I say editing, I mean filling in forms. It's no Nitro PDF. That would be too much to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Start.
customer_reviews.text: Have just began working with word, and finding it a little frustrating finding my way around using touch screen, but should speed up with practice. Does what I need to,chose it mainly for compatibility with kindle system.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent software
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Kindle Fire hd and it is excellent for the price It allows me to work on the go and I highly recommend this software.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. craiders

customer_reviews.title: this seems great!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a quick scan of this app. so far, hence the four stars. Still need to find out about printing. But I'm really pleased. This could mean my laptop spending a lot more time in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Eleri

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for on-the-go editing of documents and easy to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for on-the-go editing of documents and easy to make quick changes before use! I use this in conjunction with Dropbox in order to rapidly update documents and powerpoints, even at the last minute!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed to preview the work I do on Microsoft Office products and do small little edits to. Would not work on a whole document on it though.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Meade

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot. It's an excellent mobile office application, particularly on a kindle fire, but I also really on it as a file manager. It looks expensive compared to most of the apps on the appstore, but in this case you get what you pay for. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: t&cs scare me
customer_reviews.text: can't use it because all the company wants to do is pick up petsonal info on yourself. don't do it personal is personal.
customer_reviews.author: Ptc Considine

customer_reviews.title: Poor useability
customer_reviews.text: At the moment it is driving me round the bend, it will not accept my choice of dictionary - the OED. It keeps resetting itself. Not much use to me trying to edit my book - so its back to my PC and Word.
customer_reviews.author: NigeM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in all respects
customer_reviews.text: I have the Professional version and am delighted with the app's performance. Comprehensive range of functions and works brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: John Penrose

customer_reviews.title: Good App
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this app to take notes and to read files I download. However I liked the functionality of the old version as it was easier to navigate however I do like the design
customer_reviews.author: Dana Peart

customer_reviews.title: great way to view, edit and create Office docs
customer_reviews.text: haven't found an easier way to open a Word .docx file on the Kindle and this does it easily. Has a nice viewer as well so I can find thing quickly and easily
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Handy little app
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for producing documents for windows office, I was hoping it contained a system of making folders for topics and the like but have not found one. so docs appear as a list.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Brine

customer_reviews.title: Works reasonably well but with some issues.
customer_reviews.text: Works reasonably well but version 8 fails to recognize certain fonts in downloaded documents - even with the benefit of a font pack (for which there is an additional charge). Product support respond promptly but are unable to resolve this issue. Previous free versions of the software did not suffer from this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Seaford

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with all the added bonus of a choice of fonts. If you are familiar with Microsoft Office, then this is the ideal Android companion.
customer_reviews.author: shorts37

customer_reviews.title: A very useful product
customer_reviews.text: I chose it mainly so that I can open word documents I receive by e-mail and also to write short documents compatible with word. I have used it successfully and have recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... functions offcesuite professional 7 givees me everything i need good value very happy with
customer_reviews.text: having bought a keyboard for my kindle hdx that turned it into a mini laptop ineeded word software to make full use of all its functions offcesuite professional 7 givees me everything i need good value very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: home office
customer_reviews.text: Great. Tablet now a little home computer I never use the laptop - no need. Can be a little tedious but so much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Nutkin

customer_reviews.title: A good alternative to Microsoft
customer_reviews.text: An excellent alternative to the overpriced Microsoft and is almost as good. Can probably do with a few tweaks here and there but overall not a bad office system
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Unable to view most documents properly
customer_reviews.text: Tried opening multiple documents but often there Will be blank spaces with part of the document missing that you can't view so have up and am looking for an alternative that works
customer_reviews.author: S. Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Unfit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: I had always suspected that my kindle would be too small to do any useful work on but information entry is too figetty to be of any value. The spreadsheet/word processor is incompatible with Lotus, my regular suite so I can't use it to consult existing documents. One star max.
customer_reviews.author: cyberpop

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder
customer_reviews.text: Great little system. Can handle all types of documents that I have thrown at it. Also works brilliantly for accessing and opening external storage, including mp3s and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated, on small tablet with no printer port ...
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated, on small tablet with no printer port, for me. Mind you tablet, Kindle Fire also has no camera.was conned with that also. Once you open it you can't return.
customer_reviews.author: john milne

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting - trying to rip off the purchaser!
customer_reviews.text: Calls itself a pro app and then asks for A LOT of cash to install the basics like fonts. Not worth a penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what people like me need to carry, read and maybe work on documents and other work on my tablet. Ideal and very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: W. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Office for Kindle
customer_reviews.text: The basic functions are there, not obvious where you or what you have to click on to activate say "Copy". Have not worked out how you set the print range among a number of other things.
customer_reviews.author: Swordedge

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Good for creating and saving documents, but does not finsd all documents, especially downloads. Wish it would show muitiple windows or have a taskbar to show what items are open
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Very proffessional
customer_reviews.text: This program works better than window. I was a bit reluctant to download it at first, and when I realised how good it was I deleted the window program
customer_reviews.author: lookas

customer_reviews.title: office suite pro 7
customer_reviews.text: office suite pro 7...wanted this a year ago...used the free version...now i have the full version...no need for any other office app on android...specs
customer_reviews.author: M.Clark

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant MS Office style suite which has so far worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant MS Office style suite which has so far worked very well although positioning photos is a bit tricky. No doubt practice will make perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. Boyden

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great for viewing documents on my phone very good product and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Graaanty

customer_reviews.title: Good for those of us constantly busy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, very helpful for those of us with busy lives! I love it: I can plot ideas for my next bog presentation on the way home on the train with NO WIFI!!! ( :
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am an academic and many times I need to comment on students work and review their assignments. I am happy that this app enables that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by both the quality and the aesthetics of this app. It's very functional and practically speaking replaces a laptop office suite of a very well known company. .. :-)
customer_reviews.author: frad70

customer_reviews.title: why no manual
customer_reviews.text: Like most office packages this app has a host of feautures but the version i installed(as free app of day) has no user manual so makes it very impractical to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Short on conversion
customer_reviews.text: A reasonable product but as I have always used Open Office it won't open an open office file, and when I save the files as Word files it won't read these either, just displays a page of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: The Navigator

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have only used Word so far, playing around with fonts and styles. Lots of options and seems fairly straightforward so far. Looking forward to exploring the rest of the suite.
customer_reviews.author: Mo1

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Too many ,'premium' extras involved. There are better free alternatives
customer_reviews.author: Bunter

customer_reviews.title: I can't printing on office suite
customer_reviews.text: I can't print a document using Office Suite. I have call Kindle help Line by they can't help. I have Google cloud all is said add printer, I click on add printer and all it do go to my account. Not help from Google cloud. And yes I do have a Wi-Fi printer.
customer_reviews.author: David Bowron

customer_reviews.title: OFFICE
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted it to do. I can open all my files from the cloud, dropbox or local files.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who needs microsoft
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go. No more reams of paper just as good as Microsoft Office. Use with sky drive for instant access to documents.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This has been an extremely useful add-on for my Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: Was free app of the day. This has been an extremely useful add-on for my Kindle Fire, can now read email attachments much more easily. Pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft word equivalent
customer_reviews.text: Good for my tablet. I can amend and sign documents. Compatible with Microsoft 2010 but unable to open with Microsoft Word previous versions. Serves my purpose. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: great addition
customer_reviews.text: Good product which will make my kindle even more versatile. I am sure that I will be using it a lot more now.
customer_reviews.author: rev BM Hull

customer_reviews.title: We'll it's like MS Office on android phone/tablet
customer_reviews.text: Got it as offer from Amazon, not used this program fully but will give 5 stars now - if I see any reason not to or problem or improvement, will notify and change the rating. Very good powerful app!
customer_reviews.author: Ruman

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin... ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin...If you don't need fancy fonts don't download the font pack otherwise I have found it works almost seamlessly with office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my Kindle - but I don not use it ...
customer_reviews.text: For my Kindle - but I don not use it much. Laptop does all this kind of thing so it is emergency use only.
customer_reviews.author: John Richards

customer_reviews.title: very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very happy customer as this app its very good easy to use and very reasonable priced I've rated it as a 5****
customer_reviews.author: Michelle baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for checking scripts out!
customer_reviews.text: A great piece of software if you need to look at and edit existing documents and transfer between an Android and a PC system
customer_reviews.author: Salsatap

customer_reviews.title: Super free office app, what's  not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Does PDFS, Word docs, Excel spreadsheets. Saves them for reuse. Works great on my Samsung Tab S 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I have been using it for several years, applying each update. As with everything the more you use it the more you appreciate it. It is one of my top ten frequently used apps.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I just bought it because it was free at the time. I am glad I did. It saved me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: emo games

customer_reviews.title: download now.
customer_reviews.text: How did we manage without this in our lives??? Superior product over the other free apps.
customer_reviews.author: taffy

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: Adds another dimension to my wife's Kindle Fire HD reader, Has increased its usefulness value and given lots of help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OfficeSuite Professional 8
customer_reviews.text: for the tablet does the job takes getting used to it's functions it's "not office"
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a free app. Does what it's supposed to do. Better than what I was using before. No complaints and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: An OK product but problems in trying to print text ...
customer_reviews.text: An OK product but problems in trying to print text from Kindle to Kodak ESP7 printer. Without reliable printing, makes it a bit pointless.
customer_reviews.author: 3jags

customer_reviews.title: Good, but far from great
customer_reviews.text: Whether it's this app or kindle, pdf documents just disappear after I've read them. Flawed and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. J. Ashfield

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day, on my Kindle Fire HDX, I am writing a novel entirely using the word package, it does everything I need and more. I can write on the go, store files, do research, copy information whenever and wherever I like. It really is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C

customer_reviews.title: not to happy
customer_reviews.text: Once i had done the work i need to do could not then print of even tryed sending the e mail and hoping they could print it but it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: titch

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic suite of programs that cover all my requirements for work and social. Easy and intuitive, fits on the kindle. Got it for free.
customer_reviews.author: A. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Best app I have saved
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed that I can use Word Excel and Power point files on my Kindle Fire. Useful in meetings and presentations, saving paper and ink as hard copy not required. Using the HDMI port presentation appear on Tv very easily fot group viewing
customer_reviews.author: Noah granddad

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant - Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant and easy to use. It's on my kindle fire and its the same as using a software in a PC.
customer_reviews.author: dmchall

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little app that works perfectly very happy especially as it was free. Will keep an eye for other freebies from this developer.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: Does what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Does what you would expect from Office and is fairly easy to use if you are familiar with MS Office. Definitely a useful addition to Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.author: TellItAsItIs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a program needed for my office work which I paid almost nothing for and serves the purpose I need it for, the best buy and must have on a kindle
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Not for me thanks
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the interface at all so I decided to de-instal it in favour of a friendlier more intuitive package
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Office suite for Kindle fire
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the ideal solution. Lots of areas to discover particularly as there is no print facility on the Kindle Fire!!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: just what I.needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app. Just what is needed when you are on the move. Everything that is used on a daily basis at work.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but there are better apps out there that are easier to use
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but there are better apps out there that are easier to use. Try the free version before you buy, it could save disappointment.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Application
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a problem with OfficeSuite Pro on my smartphone or Tablet, ingenious product in my view.

customer_reviews.title: really useful app.
customer_reviews.text: I love this app. It does everything it says it will. I use it to prepare all my teaching needs and more. Great app.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I hate it really but I can't put it down!

customer_reviews.text: I have been using Office Suite Pro for quite some time and been very happy with it u til recently. Now, I cannot save documents and then reopen them. So.e documents which have been sent to me and then saved can be opened, but then do not display text.

customer_reviews.text: Good all rounder, does everything you want it to do thanks.

Plus does not enable me to read files people send me either. A complete waste of money. Personally I would like my money back not happy.

customer_reviews.text: for a freebee this is great would highly suggest you get this app

customer_reviews.text: I have a spreadsheet that has a simple formula to get the day name. Every other app can correctly use this formula. This one shows ~FORMULA~ instead. It also cannot understand print areas correctly.
